text: Family Jr. is a Canadian television channel for children. It is a part of the specialty channel Family Channel. The channel is aimed at viewers between the ages of 2 and 7 years old. The channel started on November 30, 2007. It was a Canadian version of Playhouse Disney, under license from Disney Channels Worldwide It changed to Disney Junior in 2011. Astral Media was bought by Bell Media. This caused Family Channel and Disney Junior to be a part of DHX Media (now WildBrain) in 2014. In 2015, DHX lost its rights to Disney programming. The name of DHX's Disney Junior channel was changed to Family Jr in September 2015. It was a brand extension of Family Channel. Along with its French- language counterpart, Télémagino, Family Jr. can be watched in over 4 million Canadian homes. This started in 2013. ==Programming== ===Current programming=== ====Canadian productions==== * Beep & Mort (September 5, 2023–present) * Big Block SingSong (2023 - present) * Caillou (February 5, 2018–present) * Chip and Potato (October 15, 2018–present) * Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood (September 4, 2017–present) * The Fabulous Show with Fay and Fluffy (2022–present) * Happy House of Frightenstein (2021–present) * Jonny Jetboy (2024–present) * Justin Time (September 22, 2011–present) * Kate & Mim- Mim (September 5, 2015–present) * Kiwi & Strit (2022–present) * Mighty Mike (April 1, 2019–present) * Polly Pocket (July 8, 2018–present) * Rev & Roll (September 2, 2019–present) * Space Ranger Roger (January 9, 2017–present) * Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in the Big City (October 17, 2021 – present) ====Acquired programming==== * Arthur (May 10, 2024-present) * ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks * Blippi Visits (2023 – present) * Brave Bunnies (September 6, 2022–present) * Bubble Guppies (2024–present) * Care Bears: Unlock the Magic (October 7, 2019 – present) * Curious George (September 18, 2015–present) * Dog Loves Books (2020–present) * DreamWorks Dragons: Rescue Riders (August 7, 2021–present) * Fireman Sam (2024 - present) * Grizzy and the Lemmings (March 24, 2018–present) * Go Jetters (March 1, 2021 – present) * Hey Duggee (November 2, 2020 – present) * Jungle Beat (2022–present) * Lucas the Spider (October 16, 2021 – present) * Madagascar: A Little Wild (January 9, 2021 – present) * Munki and Trunk (2024–present) * Norman Picklestripes (September 19, 2020 – present) * Petronix Defenders (January 7, 2023 – present) * The Smurfs (2023-present) * Sunny Bunnies (July 2, 2018–present) * Super Wings (2022–present) * Teletubbies (December 19, 2015–present) * The Tiny Chef Show (February 1, 2025–present) * Twirlywoos (September 5, 2015–present) * Where's Waldo?
